attributes.additional_details:
We call on the British government to give serious consideration to proscribing the Unite Against Fascism (UAF) under current anti-Terrorism legislation and the Racial and Religious hatred act.

This is a dangerous extreme left wing communist organisation frequently involved in hate campaigns and violence against ordinary citizens of the UK. The UAF are racist cultural marxists and should be outlawed.

The UAF are more extreme and hate fueled that the groups they protest against.
